<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.SMUtils</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Filters for service management</description>
        <name>SMUtils</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var SMUtils = Class.create();
SMUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    // Filter out groups that do not have the group type
    filterGroups: function(tableName, location, groupType) {
        tableName = tableName + '';
        var conf = new sn_sm.SMConfiguration();
        var appName = conf.getAppName(tableName) + '';
        var config = conf.getConfigRecord(appName);
        location = location + '';
        var groupTypeId = new SMFilters()._getGroupTypeId(config, groupType, tableName == config.task_table + '');
        return "sys_idIN" + this._getGroupsForLocation(groupTypeId, location, conf.isEnabled(config, "limit_by_location", true));
    },

    // Get the groups that have the locations
    _getGroupsForLocation: function(groupType, location, limitByLocation) {
        var ids = [];

        if ((location !== null) && (limitByLocation !== null)) {
            if (limitByLocation) {
                var sys_group_covers_location_table_name = 'sys_group_covers_location';
                var gr = new GlideAggregate(sys_group_covers_location_table_name);
                gr.addQuery("group.type", "CONTAINS", groupType);
                gr.addQuery("location", "IN", this._getTree("cmn_location", location));
                gr.addQuery("group.active", "true");
                gr.groupBy('group');
                gr.query();
                while (gr.next()) {
                    ids.push(gr.group.toString());
                }

            }
        }
        if (ids.length <= 0) {
            var grAll = new GlideRecord('sys_user_group');
            grAll.addEncodedQuery("typeLIKE" + groupType);
            grAll.addActiveQuery();
            grAll.query();
            while (grAll.next())
                ids.push(grAll.sys_id.toString());
        }
        return ids;
    },

    type: 'SMUtils'
};]]></script>
